description:
Yamada is disturbed by the arrival of a stunning new student from across the sea. The new girl quickly becomes the center of attention and sets her sights on stealing Yamada’s man!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arriva Kanejou-san! Non sopporto che sia così brillante!- Dietro quello splendido sorriso... si nasconde l`oscuro segreto di Kanejou!
Kanejo Is Coming! I Can`t Stand That Sparkle! - Behind That Rosy Smile Is... Kanejo`s Dark Secret!
Kanejou-san ga Kuru! Ano Kirakira ga Yurusenai! / Barairo no Egao no Ura ni... Kanejou no Kuroi Himitsu!!
金城さんが来る! あのキラキラが許せない! / バラ色の笑顔の裏に...金城の黒い秘密!!
